name: Evolving Light, Escaping Darkness
description:
NOTE: REQUIRES AT LEAST 1 PLAYER TO BE USING A CONTROLLER

If you're the ghost, your goal is to hunt down the explorer(s) invading your home and drain their soul before they can escape. To drain them, just get close and stare at them. You'll get faster and stronger the more life you drain from them.

As the explorer, your goal is to find the 3 keys hidden in the dungeon, get them to the locked exit, and escape before the spirit can kill you. Press down on left stick to toggle sprint.

Explorers have to use controllers, only PS4 controllers are tested but other controllers should be supported as well.

Spirit plays with keyboard and mouse. Shift/Ctrl to move up/down as the spirit.
